data.name: Bacon Man: An Adventure - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Bacon Man: An Adventure (Original Game Soundtrack)


1. Title Screen (Composed by Braxton Burks)
2. Pub Theme (Composed by Braxton Burks & Kyle Landry)
3. The Freezer (Composed by Braxton Burks & Kyle Landry)
4. Cage Fight (Composed by Braxton Burks & Kyle Landry)
5. Shop Theme (Composed by Braxton Burks & Kyle Landry)
6. Unagi's Lair (Composed by Braxton Burks & Kyle Landry)
7. Unagi Encounter (Composed by Braxton Burks & Kyle Landry)
8. Unagi Fight (Composed by Braxton Burks & Kyle Landry)
9. Lard Lass Transform (Composed by Braxton Burks)
10. Meat Zone (Composed by Braxton Burks & Kyle Landry)
11. Laser Chase (Composed by Braxton Burks & Kyle Landry)
12. Pork King Talk (Composed by Braxton Burks & Kyle Landry)
13. Pork King Fight (Composed by Braxton Burks & Kyle Landry)
14. Pork King Final Form (Composed by Braxton Burks & Kyle Landry)
15. Minor Character Talk (Composed by Braxton Burks)
16. Dairy Dream Land (Composed by Braxton Burks)
17. Feta Fight (Composed by Braxton Burks & Kyle Landry)
18. Feta Talk (Composed by Braxton Burks & Kyle Landry)
19. Ghost Beef Talk (Composed by Braxton Burks & Kyle Landry)
20. Ghost Beef Fight (Composed by Braxton Burks & Kyle Landry)
21. Pomegranate City (Composed by Braxton Burks & Kyle Landry)
22. Melon Maiden Talk (Composed by Braxton Burks & Kyle Landry)
23. Melon Maiden Fight (Composed by Braxton Burks & Kyle Landry)
24. Gilga Encounter (Composed by Braxton Burks & Kyle Landry)
25. Wheat Zone (Composed by Braxton Burks)
26. The Water Temple (Composed by Braxton Burks & Kyle Landry)
27. Pagoda of Pain (Composed by Braxton Burks & Kyle Landry)
28. Yum's Fortress (Composed by Braxton Burks)
29. Excal Talk (Composed by Braxton Burks & Kyle Landry)
30. Excal Fight (Composed by Braxton Burks & Kyle Landry)
31. Excal Death (Composed by Braxton Burks & Kyle Landry)
32. Boss Broc Fight (Composed by Braxton Burks & Kyle Landry)
33. ROBOT (Composed by Braxton Burks)
34. Credits (Composed by Braxton Burks)
35. Art Gallery (Composed by Braxton Burks)
36. Level Up!!! (Composed by Braxton Burks)
37. Pietech (Composed by Braxton Burks)
38. Pie Train (Composed by Braxton Burks)
39. Ramen Rider (Composed by Braxton Burks & Kyle Landry)
40. Level Select (Composed by Braxton Burks)

"Bacon Man: An Adventure (Original Game Soundtrack)" was made possible by the following individuals:

Braxton Burks: Composer
Kyle Landry: Composer
Angelos Dardagiannopoulos: Producer
Neal Laurenza: Producer
Ryan Lefebvre: Album Art
